dmca.title: leerburg.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Wendy - W'inc [mailto:wendy.reyn@sympatico.ca] 
Posted At: Sunday, August 13, 2006 11:01 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: leerburg.com
Subject: leerburg.com


How can you guys host and promote a website that encourages beating your
dogs, hanging them till they stop breathing and hosts a flurry of
copyrighted emails that this man mocks people on his website?
 
This website is going to get novice dog owners mauled and killed!
 
How can someone encourage someone who's "lost control of their dog" to
manhandle it and choke it until their aggression is higher than the
dogs?
 
This information is hazardous to the public, and he uses this website to
post private confidential emails and to ridicule and mock people and
their livelihoods!
